title: Employee Task Logging
short: Track and submit daily work activities effortlessly.
details: Employees can log their daily work, choose task types, input hours worked, and submit updates. Everything is date-specific and managed for HR review.

title: Salary & Payment Tracking
short: Seamless monthly payroll and salary history view.
details: HR can verify and pay employees, and each payment is saved with transaction details. Employees can view their monthly salary history anytime.

title: Performance Monitoring
short: Analyze employee efficiency with visual charts.
details: HR can analyze submitted tasks and hours via bar charts to identify top performers and optimize workload distribution.

title: Role-based Access
short: Admin, HR, and Employee â€“ separate route controls.
details: Our system grants dashboard features based on user roles. Admins manage roles and control access. HR oversees employees. Employees focus on workflow updates.

title: Time Management Reports
short: Track working hours per task with summaries.
details: Detailed work hour analytics per employee are available to assess time distribution and productivity across departments or task categories.

title: HR & Admin Controls
short: Verify employees, promote HR, fire users securely.
details: HR and Admin can change user status and control employment access, including toggling verified status, assigning roles, and blocking fired users.

title: Contract & Salary Adjustment
short: Admin can securely adjust salaries, no decreases allowed.
details: Admins can raise salaries of HRs or Employees as needed. The system prevents accidental or malicious salary reductions for security.

title: Contact & Feedback
short: Visitors can send messages. Admins review feedback.
details: An easy-to-use contact form allows anyone to send inquiries or suggestions. Admin can view all submitted messages through the dashboard.

title: Payroll Management
short: Automate salary processing and payslip generation.
details: Payroll Management automates employee salary processing, deductions, bonuses, and generates monthly payslips without errors.

title: Employee Onboarding
short: Seamless new hire integration into the company.
details: Simplify onboarding by automating document collection, training sessions, and task assignments for new employees.

title: Recruitment Automation
details: Post jobs, screen resumes, and track candidates automatically with smart recruitment tools.

title: Shift Scheduling
details: Create and manage employee work shifts, leave requests, and replacements with minimal effort.

title: Time & Attendance
short: Track attendance and work hours accurately.
details: Monitor employee work hours, late check-ins, and overtime using automated attendance tracking.

title: Training & Development
short: Boost skills through structured training programs.
details: Provide employees with e-learning, workshops, and professional development opportunities to grow in their roles.

title: Employee Benefits Management
short: Manage employee perks and benefits easily.
details: Centralize all employee benefits such as health insurance, allowances, and wellness perks for easy access.
